sentences.en: Add righteousness to a city and you have a community.
sentences.cn: 将正义赋予一座城市,你将赢得全城的居民.

sentences.en: And Moses admonishes the Israelites not to suppose that their inheritance of the land of Canaan is due to their own powers, or on account of any righteousness or virtue that they possess.
sentences.cn: 摩西警告以色列人不要想当然地认为,他们继承迦南之地是凭借了自己的力量，或者视之为他们所拥有的正义和美德。

sentences.en: Both sides in the dispute have been adopting a tone of moral righteousness.
sentences.cn: 纠纷双方说起话来都是冠冕堂皇。

sentences.en: China has always been known as a land of propriety and righteousness.
sentences.cn: 中国从来以礼义之邦著称。

sentences.en: China has always been known as a land of propriety band righteousness.
sentences.cn: 中国从来以礼义之邦著称.

sentences.en: Continue your love to those who know you, your righteousness to the upright in heart.
sentences.cn: 愿你常施慈爱给认识你的人。 常以公义待心里正直的人。

sentences.en: For the wrath of man does not accomplish the righteousness of God.
sentences.cn: 20因为人的忿怒并不成就神的义.

sentences.en: I walk in the way of righteousness along the paths of justice.
sentences.cn: 我在公义道上走,在公平的路上中行.

sentences.en: Like benevolence and righteousness, they are roost on the way of practice.
sentences.cn: 它们就像仁义一样,是修行人在修行路上的休息站.

sentences.en: May we pursue the right without self - righteousness.
sentences.cn: 愿我们追求正义而不自以为是.

sentences.en: No, no, we are not satisfied, and we will not be satisfied until justice rolls down like waters and righteousness like a mighty stream.
sentences.cn: 不，不，我们不被满意，而且我们将不会被满意直到正义滚下像像一条有势力的水流一样的水和正义。

sentences.en: Our allies are the millions who hunger and thirst after righteousness.
sentences.cn: 那些成千上万如饥似渴寻找正义的人是我们的联盟.

sentences.en: People like us must never seek petty advantages at the expense of justice and righteousness.
sentences.cn: 咱们这种人,万万不可以贪小利而忘大义.

sentences.en: Riches and honor are with me, Enduring wealth and righteousness.
sentences.cn: 箴8:18丰富尊荣在我.恒久的财并公义也在我.

sentences.en: She visualized him stomping to his car, the picture of self-righteousness.
sentences.cn: 她想象着他噔噔噔地走向车子，一副自以为是的模样。

sentences.en: The forgiveness of sins is perpetual and righteousness first is not required.
sentences.cn: 宽恕罪过是永恒的,并不计较原来是否是好人.

sentences.en: We were convinced of the righteousness of our cause.
sentences.cn: 我们坚信我们的事业是正义的.

sentences.en: Your righteousness is everlasting and your law is true.
sentences.cn: 142你的公义永远长存.你的律法尽都真实.
